Recipe.notes: To skin hazelnuts, spread them on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 10-15 minutes, until the skins have cracked. While the nuts are still quite hot, transfer to a dish towel; fold or close over the towel and rub vigorously to dislodge the skins. (This will make a mess.)
